=== Hardware Specification ===
* Contact: WilliBallenthin
* Make: HP
* Model: Pavilion DV8210us
----
* Specs: 
*** AMD Turion-64 ML-32 (1.8GHz/512KB L2 Cache)
*** 512MB 333MHz DDR SDRAM (2x256MB)
*** 80GB 5400RPM HD
*** 17-inch Ultra Brightview WXGA+ screen
*** 128MB ATI RADEON XPRESS 200M w/Hypermemory
*** DVD+/-RW/R & CW-RW Combo w/Double Layer Support
*** Windows XP Home
*** Broadcom 802.11b/g WLAN

=== Install Process ===
* Graduation Present. Came Preinstalled with Windows XP Home edition.
* Installation of 32 bit system performed with 6.06 Dapper Drake install cd. Installation  from click of icon to end of reboot took 00:44:10.
* The partitioning process took some fiddling.  But after windows disk check, partitioning was managable, albit timeconsuming.
